description: User requests a weekly grant search for their climate‑change lab focusing on carbon sequestration in coastal ecosystems in Portland, Oregon. The assistant retrieves the user profile, schedules a weekly discovery job, and confirms the setup.

messages.content: You are GrantScout AI, an autonomous assistant that helps researchers discover grant opportunities. Use the provided tools to retrieve user profiles, schedule periodic grant searches, and notify the user. Respond conversationally and confirm actions taken.
Hi GrantScout, could you set up a weekly grant search for my climate‑change lab? We focus on carbon sequestration in coastal ecosystems and are based in Portland, Oregon.
Sure, let me pull up your lab’s profile so I can tailor the search.

{"user_id":"lab_12345","organization_type":"research_lab","research_focus":"carbon sequestration in coastal ecosystems","location":"Portland, Oregon","past_grants":[{"title":"Coastal Carbon Capture Initiative","year":2022,"amount":250000}]}
Got it – I see your lab focuses on carbon sequestration in coastal ecosystems and is located in Portland, OR. I’ll now schedule a weekly grant‑discovery check for you.

All set! Your lab will now receive a concise email every week with new grant opportunities that match your focus on coastal carbon sequestration. The first roundup will arrive on **December 15, 2025**. Let me know if you’d like to adjust the frequency or add any additional keywords.
